trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The Mitron creator appears troubled.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TODO_00<tab>Show the speude bradeos figurine to people in Poieten Oikos and find who gave the shark its name.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TODO_01<tab>Return the speude bradeos figurine to the Mitron creator.

TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_000<tab>Greetings, I am a researcher from the Words of Mitron. I've dedicated my life to studying and creating aquatic life, but my main focus is the development of new shark species.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_001<tab>My latest creation has completed its round of observation at Anagnorisis, and will be released after one final test.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_002<tab>The thing is, I'm hoping to consult with a taxonomist before the Bureau of the Architect hands down its official registration.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_003<tab>...The same one who named my last shark, if I can─“speude bradeos” was such a marvelous name.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_004<tab>It turns out it's rather difficult to track down a specific person in a place such as this. Could you help me?
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_005<tab>Thank you. Here, take this─it's a model of the previous creation I just mentioned. Whoever named it should hopefully be able to recognize it.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_008<tab>Show the shark to as many people as you can. Whoever recognizes it must be the one who named it.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_RHODOPIS_000_010<tab>Was there something I could help you with?
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_RHODOPIS_000_011<tab>...Who named this species? I'm sorry but I haven't a clue. Certainly not me.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_EUAION_000_012<tab>What have we here? A roaming familiar?
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_EUAION_000_013<tab>Ah, yes, the speude bradeos. I've heard of it before, but I'm afraid I don't know who named it...
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TELAMON_000_014<tab>What's that you have there...?
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TELAMON_000_015<tab>Oh, a speude bradeos! Of course I know it─I named it, after all!
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TELAMON_000_016<tab>Its creator was calling it a “cladoselache,” but I decided to go with something more closely tied to its distinct way of moving.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TELAMON_000_017<tab>I wanted to really capture the image of it rushing forward with its tiny steps, somehow swift and slow at once.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TELAMON_000_018<tab>In case you were curious, the name comes from a proverb meaning “more haste, less speed.”

TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TELAMON_000_019<tab>And if the creator wishes me to name her newest creation, I would of course be honored to do so. It's in Anagnorisis, you say? I look forward to seeing it soon!
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_RHODOPIS_000_020<tab>I honestly have no idea who gave that shark a name.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_EUAION_000_021<tab>That creation is named so perfectly. If only I could come up with something so clever.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_TELAMON_000_022<tab>Oh, I can hardly wait to name this next shark creation!
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_100_025<tab>Any luck finding my taxonomist?
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_030<tab>You found him? And he's willing to give the new one a name, too? That is wonderful news!

TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_031<tab>This latest creation is actually a direct improvement over the last. I gave it more legs for a total of eight so it can move even <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> quickly over land.
TEXT_AKTKZH011_04306_CREATOR04306_000_032<tab>With that taken care of, I need to hurry back to Anagnorisis. But before I go... Here. A token of my gratitude.
